Html:
First I'd like to thank all the programmers for this amazing tool. This tool has improved my gameplay by allowing me to optimize my gear for DPS, tanking and healing. Thank you so much.

As a tank I generally have two goals, to have high health, and to take as little damage as possible.

To me the one optimization option missing from the tank models (Bear and Prot Paladin at least, maybe DK and Warrior have them) is the ability to opimize damage taken.

I end up trying all kinds of other optimizations to see which gets me the lowest, it would be so much easier if you just optimize that one target item with a constraint on health.

Thank you.
Mitigation Rating is inversely proportional to damage taken. If you want to minimize damage taken, then you want to maximize Mitigation Rating.
